constructor.details: It takes at least 3 * minExitPeriod before each new exit game contract is able to start protecting existing transactions     see: https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/172          https://github.com/omisego/plasma-contracts/issues/197

isExitGameSafeToUse(address).details: Exposes information about exit games quarantine

params._contract: Address of the exit game contract

isExitGameSafeToUse(address).return: boolean Whether the contract is safe to use and is not under quarantine

registerExitGame(uint256,address,uint8).details: Emits ExitGameRegistered event to notify clients

params._contract: Address of the exit game contract
params._protocol: The transaction protocol, either 1 for MVP or 2 for MoreVP
params._txType: The tx type where the exit game wants to register

exitGameToTxType(address).notice: Public getter for retrieving tx type with exit game address

exitGames(uint256).notice: Public getter for retrieving exit game address with tx type

isExitGameSafeToUse(address).notice: Checks whether the contract is safe to use and is not under quarantine

protocols(uint256).notice: Public getter for retrieving protocol with tx type

registerExitGame(uint256,address,uint8).notice: Registers an exit game within the PlasmaFramework. Only the maintainer can call the function.
